bank.title: Calculus for Team-Based Inquiry Learning (2024 Edition PREVIEW)

outcome.title: Limits graphically
outcome.description: Understand how limits and graphs of a function are related.

outcome.title: Limits numerically
outcome.description: Infer the value of a limit based on nearby values of the function.

outcome.title: Limits analytically
outcome.description: Compute limits of functions given algebraically, using proper limit properties.

outcome.title: Continuity
outcome.description: Determine where a function is and is not continuous.

outcome.title: Limits with infinite inputs
outcome.description: Determine limits of functions at infinity.

outcome.title: Limits with infinite outputs
outcome.description: Determine limits of functions approaching vertical asymptotes.

outcome.title: Derivatives graphically and numerically
outcome.description: Estimate the value of a derivative using difference quotients, and draw corresponding secant and tangent lines on the graph of a function.

outcome.title: Derivatives analytically
outcome.description: Find derivatives using the definition of derivative as a limit.

outcome.title: Elementary derivative rules
outcome.description: Compute basic derivatives using algebraic rules.

outcome.title: The product and quotient rules
outcome.description: Compute derivatives using the Product and Quotient Rules.

outcome.title: The chain rule
outcome.description: Compute derivatives using the Chain Rule.

outcome.title: Differentiation strategy
outcome.description: Compute derivatives using a combination of algebraic derivative rules.

outcome.title: Implicit differentiation
outcome.description: Compute derivatives of implicitly-defined functions.

outcome.title: Derivatives of inverse functions
outcome.description: Compute derivatives of inverse functions.

outcome.title: Tangents, Motion, and Marginals
outcome.description: Use derivatives to answer questions about tangents, motion, and marginals.

outcome.title: Linear Approximation
outcome.description: Approximate a function with a tangent line.

outcome.title: Related rates
outcome.description: Model and analyze scenarios using related rates.

outcome.title: Extreme Value Theorem
outcome.description: Use the Extreme Value Theorem to find the global maximum and minimum values of a continuous function on a closed interval.

outcome.title: Derivative tests
outcome.description: Apply Derivative Tests to classify the critical points as local extrema.

outcome.title: Concavity and inflection
outcome.description: Determine the intervals of concavity of a function and find all of its points of inflection.

outcome.title: Graphing with derivatives
outcome.description: I can sketch the graph of a differentiable function whose derivatives satisfy given criteria.

outcome.title: Applied optimization
outcome.description: Model and analyze scenarios using applied optimization.

outcome.title: L'Hôpital's Rule
outcome.description: Use L'Hôpital's Rule to find limits.

outcome.title: Geometry of definite integrals
outcome.description: Use geometric formulas to find definite integrals.

outcome.title: Approximating definite integrals
outcome.description: Approximate definite integrals using variations of Riemann sums.

outcome.title: Basic antiderivatives
outcome.description: Find basic antiderivatives.

outcome.title: Initial Value Problems
outcome.description: Solve basic initial value problems.

outcome.title: FTC for Definite Integrals
outcome.description: Evaluate a definite integral using the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus.

outcome.title: FTC for Derivatives
outcome.description: Evaluate the derivative of a definite integral using the Fundamental Theorem of Calculus.

outcome.title: Area under curves
outcome.description: Use definite integrals to find areas under curves.

outcome.title: Area between curves
outcome.description: Use definite integrals to find areas between two curves.

outcome.title: Substitution method
outcome.description: Evaluate various integrals via the substitution method.

outcome.title: Integration by parts
outcome.description: Compute integrals using integration by parts.

outcome.title: Integration of Trignometry
outcome.description: Compute integrals involving products of trigonometric functions.

outcome.title: Trigonometric Substitution
outcome.description: Use trigonometric substitution to compute indefinite integrals.

outcome.title: Table of Integrals
outcome.description: Integrate functions using a table of integrals.

outcome.title: Partial fractions
outcome.description: Integrate using the method of partial fractions.

outcome.title: Integration strategy
outcome.description: Select appropriate strategies for integration.

outcome.title: Improper integrals
outcome.description: Identify and compute improper integrals.

outcome.title: Average Values
outcome.description: Compute the average value of a function on an interval.

outcome.title: Arc Length
outcome.description: Estimate the arclength of a curve with Riemann sums and find an integral which computes the arclength.

outcome.title: Volumes of Revolution
outcome.description: Compute volumes of solids of revolution.

outcome.title: Areas of Revolution
outcome.description: Compute surface areas of surfaces of revolution.

outcome.title: Density, Mass, Centers of Mass
outcome.description: Set up integrals to solve problems involving density, mass, and center of mass.

outcome.title: Work
outcome.description: Set up integrals to solve problems involving work.

outcome.title: Force and Pressure
outcome.description: Set up integrals to solve problems involving force and/or pressure.

outcome.title: Parametric/vector equations
outcome.description: Sketch the graph of a two-dimensional parametric/vector equation, and convert such equations into equations of only x and y.

outcome.title: Parametric/vector derivatives
outcome.description: Compute derivatives and tangents related to two-dimensional parametric/vector equations.

outcome.title: Parametric/vector arclength
outcome.description: Compute arclengths related to two-dimensional parametric/vector equations.

outcome.title: Polar coordinates
outcome.description: Convert points and equations between polar and Cartesian coordinates and equations.

outcome.title: Polar arclength
outcome.description: Compute arclengths of curves given in polar coordinates.

outcome.title: Polar area
outcome.description: Compute areas bounded by curves given in polar coordinates.

outcome.title: Sequence formulas
outcome.description: Define and use explicit and recursive formulas for sequences.

outcome.title: Sequence properties and limits
outcome.description: Determine if a sequence is convergent, divergent, monotonic, or bounded, and compute limits of convergent sequences.

outcome.title: Partial sum sequence
outcome.description: Convert a (telescoping) sequence into its partial sum sequence, and find its limit.

outcome.title: Geometric summations
outcome.description: Determine convergence and values of geometric summations.

outcome.title: Basic convergence tests
outcome.description: Use Divergence, Alternating Summation, and Integral Tests to determine convergence of summations.

outcome.title: Comparison tests
outcome.description: Use Direct and Limit Comparison Tests to determine convergence of summations.

outcome.title: Ratio and Root tests
outcome.description: Use Ratio and Root Tests to determine convergence of summations.

outcome.title: Absolute convergence
outcome.description: Determine absolute and conditional convergence of summations.

outcome.title: Summation convergence strategy
outcome.description: Identify appropriate convergence tests for various summations.

outcome.title: Power series
outcome.description: Approximate functions defined as power series.

outcome.title: Domain of power series
outcome.description: Describe the domain of convergence for a given power series.

outcome.title: Manipulation of power series
outcome.description: Compute power series by manipulating known exponential/trigonometric/binomial power series.

outcome.title: Taylor series
outcome.description: Compute a Taylor or Maclaurin series for a function.
